HediffDef.label: love thrall
HediffDef.description: This person has been psychically enthralled by another. Their mind has been scrambled, making them undyingly loyal and enamoured with their master. This connection can only be broken by death of either the thrall or its master.

HediffDef.label: recent impregnation
HediffDef.description: This person was recently impregnated. Despite being able to support multiple pregnancies at once, they still need some time before they can get pregnant again.
